EmailTemplate.subject: Forrester Report: Why Software Is Your Most Critical Corporate Asset
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Why do companies like Amazon, Netflix, Stripe, and Uber value software more than any other corporate asset? Because they understand that software is what allows them to deliver unique digital experiences for their customers and prospects. According to Forrester Research, most IT organizations at Fortune 500 companies don't have the right operational models to build and deliver next-generation digital experiences.
In “Digital Transformation Requires Development Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/digital-transformation-requires-development-transformation?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=dev-trans-forrester-q119]]>,” Forrester Research argues that to harness the revenue-generating potential of digital business, IT leaders should familiarize themselves with the four pillars at the heart of it: Digital Experiences, Digital Operations, Digital Ecosystems, Digital Innovation..
Regardless of where you are on your digital transformation journey, this report will help you clearly define the areas to focus on, and validate the initiatives you may have already started. Read it today <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/digital-transformation-requires-development-transformation?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=dev-trans-forrester-q119]]> and then let us know <[[https://pivotal.io/contact?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=dev-trans-forrester-q119]]> how we can help!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
